data.name: Here I Come
data.detailed_description:
One day you were kidnapped by a psycho named Freek, and forced into a secret underground facility to take part in a deadly reality show.

The rules are simple: be the last one to survive. Meanwhile, thousands, if not millions, of people watch in real time and bid on who will win.

'Here I Come' is an atmospheric horror game in which learning when to hide or run are key factors to survive.

Run for your life!
data.about_the_game:
One day you were kidnapped by a psycho named Freek, and forced into a secret underground facility to take part in a deadly reality show.

The rules are simple: be the last one to survive. Meanwhile, thousands, if not millions, of people watch in real time and bid on who will win.

'Here I Come' is an atmospheric horror game in which learning when to hide or run are key factors to survive.

Run for your life!
data.short_description: Stay alive in a deadly reality show.
data.supported_languages: English, Japanese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core (i5 2300) or AMD Octo-Core (FX 8150)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680 or greater, AMD Radeon R9 380 or greater, 4GB VRAM or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content
